bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Requirements, Terminology, and Test Procedures for Neutral Grounding Devices
IEEE Standard for Requirements, Terminology, and Test Procedures for Neutral Grounding Devices
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.32-2015 (Revision of IEEE Std 32-1972)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to devices used for the purpose of controlling the ground current or the potentials to ground of an alternating current system. These devices are: grounding transformers, ground-fault neutralizers, resistors, reactors, or combinations of these.

This standard applies to devices used for the purpose of controlling the ground current or the potentials to ground of an alternating current system. These devices are: grounding transformers, ground-fault neutralizers, resistors, reactors, or combinations of these.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
